pages.title: Simple Magnets
pages.text: $(mod)Simple Magnets$() adds $(item)Magnets$() that help you pick up items and xp at greater distance.$(br2)Right-click a Magnet to turn it on or off. Sneak right-click an $(o)Advanced$() Magnet to configure it.
The $(item)Demagnetization Coil$() stops the Magnet from picking up items nearby.$(br2)The $(item)Advanced$() version has a higher range and can be filtered.
